programme.title: The Slams
programme.desc: Rival prison factions surround a Los Angeles convict (Jim Brown) who has $1.5 million stashed on the outside.

programme.title: The Split
programme.desc: A woman (Julie Harris) wants a crook (Jim Brown) to form a gang to rob the Los Angeles Coliseum during a big Rams game.

programme.title: Melinda
programme.desc: An ex-girlfriend (Rosalind Cash) and a karate class help a disc jockey (Calvin Lockhart) avenge his slain girlfriend (Vonetta McGee).

programme.title: The Clones of Bruce Lee
programme.desc: A brilliant professor gathers cells from the late Bruce Lee and constructs three perfect clones. Trained to be masters, the clones battle to stop criminals and smugglers.

programme.title: Enter the Game of Death
programme.desc: In the 1920s, three Chinese gang members try to retrieve a military document concerning a Japanese invasion.

programme.title: Rock and Roll Revue
programme.desc: Vintage clips of great jazz artists.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Mrs. Georgia Jackson, mother of slain Soledad Brother George Jackson, is interviewed by producer Ellis Haizlip; Latin-jazz sounds of seven man combo, Mandrill; LaBelle (Formerly Patti LaBelle and the Bluebells).

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Passages from Frederick Douglass' greatest orations, dramatized by Arthur Bufghardt; performances by drummer Max Roach and his jazz ensemble; the J. C. White Singers.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Author James Baldwin is interviewed by the young Black poetess Nikki Giovanni; taped in London.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: The second installment in a special, two-part program featuring James Baldwin.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: Coming To Soul Flix... Shaft, Cleopatra Jones, Graffiti Bridge, Greased Lightning and others.

programme.title: Jazz Session at the Blue Note With Chaka Khan
programme.sub-title: Jazz Session at the Blue Note With Chaka Khan
programme.desc: Recorded in 1993 at the Blue Note Jazz Club in New York City, this performance by Chaka Khan features a number of songs closely associated with jazz.

programme.title: Knightriders
programme.desc: George Romero's unusual story of a modern-day Renaissance troupe whose participants follow a medieval code of honor.

programme.title: Starcrash
programme.desc: A space explorer and his girlfriend try to protect Earth from devastation.

programme.title: Warriors of the Year 2072
programme.desc: In 2072 Rome, Italy, a ruthless TV network CEO plots to stage a modern series of gladiator games for ratings.

programme.title: Cool Breeze
programme.desc: A paroled crook (Thalmus Rasulala) masterminds a $3 million jewelry theft to fund a bank for businessmen.
